name: Vladimir Jones
description:
Vladimir Jones (VJ) is one of the original independent, integrated advertising agencies in the U.S. Founded in 1970, we have, since the beginning, believed in the power of brilliant brands. We love what they do for people, we love how they do it, and we want to help them do it for more people. We also believe that every brand needs a true partner. 
A true partner moves with agility, thinks big, acts bigger, and sees deeply enough to realize brands’ potential and help them grow. Every brand benefits from an outside perspective.
To activate the brilliance in brands, we use tools like consumer insight, digital and media strategy, and compelling creative. But the most important tool we use is trust. We create relationships that last - with our clients, with our clients’ consumers and within the walls of our agency. 
The result of this approach, which we call brand altruism, is partnerships that are fresh and productive, yielding sharp strategy, resonant creative, and consistent results.
